scene_0.txt_startnew_card: Opens the file importer to select new files and start the visualization afterwards.
scene_0.txt_repatlast_card: Start the visualization with the files of the last run. The files are based on location on disk.
scene_0.txt_settings_card: Change the settings for the application including <u>occlusion handling</u> and <u>resolution</u> settings.
scene_0.txt_help_card: Open the help / info panel to de-/activate the <u>Tutorial</u> or get information about this program.
